Download
========

A prebuilt version of the CFDwavemaker can be downloaded from at the locations given below

`CFDwavemaker for Linux`_ ( compiled using ubuntu (v1604) with openMP support)

`CFDwavemaker for Win64`_ ( compiled on Win10,  Visual Studio 2019)

unpack the files and follow the installation instructions in :numref:`installation:Installation and usage`.


.. _`CFDwavemaker for Linux`: http://basilisk.fr

.. _`CFDwavemaker for Win64`: http://basilisk.fr
